messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2115
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/17/2002 2:17:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Sorry; missed that! I m planning, by myself. I m calling in favors from everywhere.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/17/2002 2:17:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> I read the unschooling.com online newsletter and saw there are a few
> unschooler conferences around. Where does the funding come from and
> who plans them?
>
Sorry; missed that!

I'm planning, by myself. I'm calling in favors from everywhere. Registrations
will hopefully cover travel and expenses from the presenters, and I'm begging
and borrowing for everything else. If we can fill the hotel, there's no
charge there---so make your reservations soon! <g>

Funding? Hah! Beg, borrow, and beg some more!

Seriously, if you're interested in pulling something like this off yourself,
write me priavtely and I'll help all I can---but you might want to wait until
it's over!--to see whether I lose my shirt! <G>

Kelly


Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
Fax: 803-776-7006
http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org
